metadata.title: Autocode Agents Log
metadata.description: Comprehensive log tracking system for autocode agent interactions, file changes, and system modifications with detailed timestamps and integration tracking

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp (UTC) of when the change occurred, format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ

agent.description: Identifier of the autocode agent or system that made the change (e.g., 'Auto', 'Claude', 'GPT-4', 'CustomAgent-v1.2')

agent_version.description: Version or build identifier of the agent instance that performed the action

action.description: Type of action performed by the autocode agent

files.description: Array of files affected by this change, tracked with detailed operation metadata

path.description: Relative path to the file from repository root

operation.description: Specific operation performed on the file

lines_changed.description: Number of lines added, modified, or removed (negative for deletions, positive for additions)

lines_added.description: Number of lines added to the file

lines_removed.description: Number of lines removed from the file

interactions.description: Array of system components, APIs, services, or tools that the autocode agent interacted with during the operation

component.description: Name of the component, service, tool, or integration point

type.description: Type of interaction or integration point

status.description: Status result of the interaction attempt

duration_ms.description: Duration of the interaction in milliseconds (if applicable)

error_message.description: Error message if status is 'failure' or 'warning'

dependencies.description: Array of dependencies that were added, updated, or removed during this operation

version.description: Version of the dependency (semver format preferred)

previous_version.description: Previous version if this is an update operation

package_manager.description: Package manager used for this dependency operation

code_analysis.description: Code quality and analysis metrics generated by the autocode agent

complexity_score.description: Cyclomatic complexity score of modified code

test_coverage.description: Test coverage percentage for affected code

summary.description: Human-readable summary describing the changes, actions, and outcomes in detail

detailed_description.description: Extended description providing context, rationale, and technical details of the changes

roadmap_impact.description: Array of roadmap items, features, or project milestones affected by this change

tags.description: Array of tags for categorizing and filtering log entries

ci_cd_status.description: CI/CD pipeline status and configuration changes resulting from this operation

workflow_modified.description: Whether CI/CD workflow files were modified

tests_added.description: Whether new tests were added as part of this change

lint_status.description: Status of linting checks after this change

deployment_status.description: Deployment status if deployment was attempted

performance_metrics.description: Performance-related metrics associated with this change

execution_time_ms.description: Total execution time for the agent operation in milliseconds

memory_usage_mb.description: Memory usage during the operation in megabytes

files_processed.description: Total number of files processed during this operation

entries.summary: Initial setup: Created agent rules documentation (Agens.MD) with 9 comprehensive rules for code documentation, change tracking, and development workflow. Created AgentsLog.json schema for tracking agent interactions with timestamped entries. Fixed CI/CD workflow (.github/workflows/ci.yml) by removing invalid flags (--no-install-workspace, @-e .), fixing indentation, and restoring proper uv sync and ruff commands. Verified Git (2.51.0) and npx (11.6.2) availability. All linting checks passed.
entries.detailed_description: This entry represents the initial setup of the autocode agent logging system. The Agens.MD file was created to establish comprehensive rules for agent behavior, code documentation standards, and development workflow guidelines. The AgentsLog.json schema was designed to track all agent interactions with detailed timestamps, file changes, system integrations, and CI/CD status. The CI/CD workflow was fixed to ensure proper Python dependency management using uv and code quality checks using ruff. All tools and integrations were verified to be functioning correctly.
